meanings.def: a statement showing that two amounts or values are equal, for example 2x + y = 54
examples: the numbers on the right-hand side of the equation
the equation for a straight line
The ideal gas equation is derived from this model.
This can be shown by a simple equation.
the range of values of ξ which would satisfy this equation

meanings.def: the act of making something equal or considering something as equal (= of equating them)
examples: The equation of wealth with happiness can be dangerous.

meanings.def: a problem or situation in which several things must be considered and dealt with
examples: When children enter the equation, further tensions may arise within a marriage.
Money also comes into the equation.
The availability of public transport is also part of the equation.
